thread.section_title: BullionVault Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BullionVault | www.bullionvault.com
thread.title: D S B
thread.title_full: BullionVault reviewed by D S B

author: D S B
title: D S B
text:
After checking several financial sources and reviews i decided on BV. It was quick & easy to join & to deposit money ready to buy with. The usual anti-laundering checks were made promptly (only sight problem was the document submission page not making clear beforehand the max file size they wanted so some small trial & error). I read the Ts and Cs - all very reasonable as are the published charges.
Trading screens are new to me but after a few minutes I mastered buying and am happy.
